Package com.example.telecom.paris.model

Interface MazePersistenceManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileMazePersistenceManager
public interface MazePersistenceManager
Interface providing methods to manage the persistence of com.example.telecom.paris.maze models into a data store such as files, databases or any other permanent storage. Required by the com.example.telecom.paris.maze editor when the com.example.telecom.paris.maze must be saved or read from the storage.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    delete (MazeModel mazeModel)
    Deletes the specified com.example.telecom.paris.maze model from the data store of this persistence manager.
    void
    persist (MazeModel mazeModel)
    Persists the specified com.example.telecom.paris.maze model into the data store of this persistence manager.
    MazeModel
    read (String mazeId)
    Reads a com.example.telecom.paris.maze model from the data store of this persistence manager from the ID of the required com.example.telecom.paris.maze model.

  • Method Details

    • read

      MazeModel read (String mazeId) throws IOException
      Reads a com.example.telecom.paris.maze model from the data store of this persistence manager from the ID of the required com.example.telecom.paris.maze model.
      Parameters:
      mazeId - A String identifying this com.example.telecom.paris.maze model uniquely in the data store of this persistence manager.
      Returns:
      The read com.example.telecom.paris.maze model
      Throws:
      IOException - When a problem occurs when reading the com.example.telecom.paris.maze (e.g. wrong mazeId, unavailable data store or locked resource, etc.).

    • persist

      void persist (MazeModel mazeModel) throws IOException
      Persists the specified com.example.telecom.paris.maze model into the data store of this persistence manager.
      Parameters:
      mazeModel - The com.example.telecom.paris.maze model object.
      Throws:
      IOException - When a problem occurs when persisting the com.example.telecom.paris.maze (e.g. wrong mazeId, unavailable data store or locked resource, etc.).

    • delete

      boolean delete (MazeModel mazeModel) throws IOException
      Deletes the specified com.example.telecom.paris.maze model from the data store of this persistence manager.
      Parameters:
      mazeModel - The com.example.telecom.paris.maze model object.
      Returns:
      A boolean stating if the specified com.example.telecom.paris.maze model was removed or not from the data store, according to its existence in the data store.
      Throws:
      IOException - When a problem occurs when deleting the com.example.telecom.paris.maze (e.g. wrong mazeId, unavailable data store or locked resource, etc.).
